summary: Sheldon Allan "Shel" Silverstein  was an American writer, poet, singer-songwriter, musician, composer, cartoonist, screenwriter, and a children's author who is mostly known for his children's book The Giving Tree.
full_text: Sheldon Allan "Shel" Silverstein  was an American poet, singer-songwriter, cartoonist, screenwriter, and author of children's books. He styled himself as Uncle Shelby in some works. Translated into more than 30 languages, his books have sold over 20 million copies.
title: Shel Silverstein
